title: Pear Install : Warning require once 'Structures/Graph/Node.php'
body:
Hello, I have a problem when trying to install PHPUnit with pear: 
pear install phpunit/PHPUnit

I have this problem : 
E:\wamp\wamp\bin\php\php5.3.5>pear channel-discover pear.phpunit.de
Channel "pear.phpunit.de" is already initialized

E:\wamp\wamp\bin\php\php5.3.5>pear install phpunit/PHPUnit
phpunit/PHPUnit can optionally use PHP extension "dbus"
phpunit/PHPUnit can optionally use PHP extension "soap"
